text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 98 of 247 226 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross

(Jury present) THE COURT: Members of the jury, I guess it ended up being more a medium break, but you're getting your steps in. So, we are ready to proceed, Mr. Everdell, whenever you're ready. MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. Hi again, Mr. Visoski. A. Hi. Q. So when we broke, we were talking about other people in Epstein's world who had that same first name as we were talking about as Jane; right? A. Yes. Q. And you said that Epstein had an assistant with that same first name? A. Yes, there was another person with that same name. Q. And spelled the same way? A. Correct. Q. And you met that person? A. Yes. MR. EVERDELL: Now, just for the Court, the deputy, and for the witness, if you could please display LV3A and LV3B, if you can display them together. Q. Do you see those, Mr. Visoski? A. Yes, I do.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
